did.unittitle: Beta Theta Pi, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consists of published materials of Beta Theta Pi, Phi Chi Chapter at Yale.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Beta Theta Pi. Phi Chi Chapter (Yale University)

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 40 (YRG 40), Records of Yale clubs, societies, and organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Beta Theta Pi, Yale University, Records (RU 306). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consists of published materials of Beta Theta Pi, Phi Chi Chapter at Yale.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Beta Theta Pi, Phi Chi Chapter (also known as Covington Trust Association) was established at Yale in 1892.
